title: My Account Got Perma-Banned With No Reasoning?
body:
https://imgur.com/PrfrnFt

I checked my email and there is nothing there. Can you resend the email?

replies.body: This account isn't banned for anything you did or anything behavior related. It showed heavy signs of compromise so we want to make sure this account only goes back to its original creator. Hit up our account agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to start the verification process.
